wikipedia_page.main: Sidney Clifton Horace "Sid" Evans (1881 – 8 January 1927) was a British heavyweight boxer who competed in the early twentieth century. He won a silver medal in Boxing at the 1908 Summer Olympics. Evans was born in Aldermaston in West Berkshire.

response: Oldman was born in Mile End, London in 1883. His passage to Olympic gold was one of the smoothest ever as he knocked out his first rival within a minute. He received a bye in the semi-final and defeated Sydney Evans, his fellow Briton, in less than two minutes in the final.
